src/newtonERP/viewers/secondStep/CheckListViewer.java

00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import java.util.HashSet;
00004 import java.util.TreeMap;
00005 
00006 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.CheckListViewable;
00007 
00012 public class CheckListViewer
00013 {
00018         @SuppressWarnings("null")
00019         public static String getHtmlCode(CheckListViewable entity)
00020         {
00021                 String html = "";
00022                 String isChecked;
00023                 String currentDescription;
00024                 String previousFirstWord = null;
00025                 String currentFirstWord = null;
00026                 String currentSecondWord = null;
00027                 String previousSecondWord = null;
00028                 TreeMap<String, String> availableElementList = entity
00029                                 .getAvailableElementList();
00030 
00031                 HashSet<String> checkedElementList = entity.getCheckedElementList();
00032 
00033                 html += "<div class=\"checkList\">";
00034                 html += "<h3>" + entity.getVisibleDescription() + "</h3>";
00035 
00036                 html += "<ul>";
00037                 for (String currentDescriptionI : availableElementList.keySet())
00038                 {
00039                         currentDescription = currentDescriptionI;
00040 
00041                         String id = availableElementList.get(currentDescription);
00042 
00043                         while (wordCount(currentDescription) < 3)
00044                                 currentDescription += " -";
00045 
00046                         if (wordCount(currentDescription) > 1)
00047                         {
00048                                 currentFirstWord = getFirstWord(currentDescription);
00049                                 currentDescription = removeFirstWord(currentDescription);
00050                                 currentSecondWord = getFirstWord(currentDescription);
00051 
00052                                 if (!currentFirstWord.equals(previousFirstWord))
00053                                 {
00054                                         previousSecondWord = null;
00055                                         if (previousFirstWord != null)
00056                                                 html += "</ul>";
00057 
00058                                         html += "\n<li>" + currentFirstWord + "</li><ul>";
00059                                 }
00060 
00061                                 if (wordCount(currentDescription) > 1)
00062                                         currentDescription = removeFirstWord(currentDescription);
00063                         }
00064 
00065                         if (!currentSecondWord.equals(previousSecondWord)
00066                                         && currentSecondWord != null)
00067                         {
00068                                 if (previousSecondWord != null)
00069                                         html += "\n</li>";
00070 
00071                                 html += "\n<li>" + currentSecondWord + ": <br />";
00072                         }
00073 
00074                         // Unpeu bâtard comme manière de faire mais le layout de DIV
00075                         // table-cell
00076                         // ne semble pas bien marcher sur IE 6
00077                         html += "<table class=\"checkBoxAtomicElement\" style=\"display:inline\"><tr><td>";
00078 
00079                         if (checkedElementList.contains(id))
00080                                 isChecked = " checked";
00081                         else
00082                                 isChecked = "";
00083 
00084                         html += "<input type=\"checkbox\" name=\"" + id + "\"" + isChecked
00085                                         + "></input> " + currentDescription;
00086 
00087                         /*
00088                          * if (currentSecondWord != previousSecondWord && currentSecondWord
00089                          * != null) html += "</li>";
00090                          */
00091 
00092                         html += "</td></tr></table>";
00093 
00094                         previousFirstWord = currentFirstWord;
00095                         previousSecondWord = currentSecondWord;
00096                 }
00097                 html += "</ul>";
00098 
00099                 html += "</div>";
00100 
00101                 return html;
00102         }
00103 
00104         private static String removeFirstWord(String currentDescription)
00105         {
00106                 return currentDescription.substring(currentDescription.indexOf(' '))
00107                                 .trim();
00108         }
00109 
00110         private static String getFirstWord(String currentDescription)
00111         {
00112                 return currentDescription.split(" ")[0].trim();
00113         }
00114 
00115         private static int wordCount(String currentDescription)
00116         {
00117                 return currentDescription.split(" ").length;
00118         }
00119 }
